SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, NOTICE_BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE, VIEW_CNT, RECOMMEND_CNT FROM NOTICE_BOARD ORDER BY NOTICE_BOARD_NO)
WHERE RN > ((#{pageNo}-1) * 5) AND RN <= (#{pageNo}) * 5
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM NOTICE_BOARD

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, ID, NAME, NICKNAME, EMAIL, PHONE_NUM, ACCUM_ACTIVITY_POINT, ACO_MONEY, ACO_POINT, LEAVE_DATE FROM MEMBER ORDER BY MEMBER_NO)
WHERE RN > ((#{pageNo}-1) * 10) AND RN <= (#{pageNo}) * 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, r.REPORT_TYPE, r.REPORT_CONTENT, m.NAME as reporter_name, r.REPORT_DATE, r.REPORT_STATE, r.BOARD_TYPE, r.BOARD_NO, o.NAME as reportee_name FROM REPORT r JOIN MEMBER m on r.REPORTER = m.MEMBER_NO JOIN MEMBER o on r.REPORTEE = o.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY r.REPORT_NO)
WHERE RN > ((#{pageNo}-1) * 10) AND RN <= (#{pageNo}) * 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, Q.QNA_BOARD_NO, M.NAME as qna_name, Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, Q.QNA_ANSWER_CONTENT, Q.WRITE_DATE, Q.CHANGE_DATE, S.SUB_CODE_NAME as qna_state, Q.VIEW_CNT FROM QNA_BOARD Q JOIN MEMBER M ON Q.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN SUB_CODE_TBL S ON Q.ANSWER_STATE = S.SUB_CODE ORDER BY Q.QNA_BOARD_NO)
WHERE RN > ((#{pageNo}-1) * 10) AND RN <= (#{pageNo}) * 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, S.SETTLEMENT_NO, M.NAME as settle_name, S.SETTLEMENT_REQ_POINT, S.REQ_ACCOUNT, S.REQ_ACCOUNT_NAME, S.REQ_ACCOUNT_BANKCODE, S.REQ_BANKNAME, C.SUB_CODE_NAME as settle_state FROM SETTLEMENT S JOIN MEMBER M ON S.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN SUB_CODE_TBL C ON S.PROCESS_STATUS = C.SUB_CODE ORDER BY S.SETTLEMENT_NO)
WHERE RN > ((#{pageNo}-1) * 10) AND RN <= (#{pageNo}) * 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, E.EMO_NO, E.EMO_NAME, E.EMO_PRICE, E.EMO_DESC, E.EMO_FIRSTIMG, E.EMO_INNERIMG, E.EMO_PATH, C.SUB_CODE_NAME AS EMOTICON_STATE FROM EMOTICON E JOIN SUB_CODE_TBL C ON E.EMO_STATE = C.SUB_CODE ORDER BY E.EMO_NO)
WHERE RN > ((#{pageNo}-1) * 10) AND RN <= (#{pageNo}) * 10

SELECT E.EMO_NO, E.EMO_NAME, E.EMO_PRICE, E.EMO_DESC, E.EMO_FIRSTIMG, E.EMO_INNERIMG, E.EMO_PATH, C.SUB_CODE_NAME AS EMOTICON_STATE FROM EMOTICON E JOIN SUB_CODE_TBL C ON E.EMO_STATE = C.SUB_CODE WHERE E.EMO_STATE = 'D001' ORDER BY E.EMO_NO
SELECT E.EMO_FIRSTIMG, E.EMO_NAME, E.EMO_PRICE, M.EMO_BUYDATE, E.EMO_PATH, E.EMO_NO FROM MY_EMOTICON M JOIN EMOTICON E ON M.EMO_NO = E.EMO_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo} ORDER BY M.EMO_BUYDATE

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN REPORT_STATE = 'B001' THEN 1 END)AS SCOUNT FROM REPORT UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN ANSWER_STATE = 'P001' THEN 1 END) FROM QNA_BOARD UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN PROCESS_STATUS = 'O001' THEN 1 END) FROM SETTLEMENT UNION ALL SELECT ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN REPORT_STATE != 'B001' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(REPORT_STATE)*100) FROM REPORT UNION ALL SELECT ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN ANSWER_STATE != 'P001' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(ANSWER_STATE)*100) FROM QNA_BOARD UNION ALL SELECT ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN PROCESS_STATUS != 'O001' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(PROCESS_STATUS)*100) FROM SETTLEMENT

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, ID, NAME, NICKNAME, EMAIL, PHONE_NUM, ACCUM_ACTIVITY_POINT, ACO_MONEY, ACO_POINT, LEAVE_DATE FROM MEMBER
WHERE LEAVE_DATE IS NOT NULL WHERE LEAVE_DATE IS NULL
ORDER BY MEMBER_NO)
WHERE RN > ((#{pageNo}-1) * 10) AND RN <= (#{pageNo}) * 10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM MEMBER

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM MEMBER
WHERE LEAVE_DATE IS NOT NULL WHERE LEAVE_DATE IS NULL

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, r.REPORT_TYPE, r.REPORT_CONTENT, m.NAME as reporter_name, r.REPORT_DATE, r.REPORT_STATE, r.BOARD_TYPE, r.BOARD_NO, o.NAME as reportee_name FROM REPORT r JOIN MEMBER m on r.REPORTER = m.MEMBER_NO JOIN MEMBER o on r.REPORTEE = o.MEMBER_NO

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM REPORT

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, Q.QNA_BOARD_NO, M.NAME as qna_name, Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, Q.QNA_ANSWER_CONTENT, Q.WRITE_DATE, Q.CHANGE_DATE, S.SUB_CODE_NAME as qna_state, Q.VIEW_CNT FROM QNA_BOARD Q JOIN MEMBER M ON Q.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN SUB_CODE_TBL S ON Q.ANSWER_STATE = S.SUB_CODE

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM QNA_BOARD

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, S.SETTLEMENT_NO, M.NAME as settle_name, S.SETTLEMENT_REQ_POINT, S.REQ_ACCOUNT, S.REQ_ACCOUNT_NAME, S.REQ_ACCOUNT_BANKCODE, S.REQ_BANKNAME, C.SUB_CODE_NAME as settle_state FROM SETTLEMENT S JOIN MEMBER M ON S.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN SUB_CODE_TBL C ON S.PROCESS_STATUS = C.SUB_CODE

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM SETTLEMENT
WHERE PROCESS_STATUS = 'O001' WHERE PROCESS_STATUS = 'O002'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, E.EMO_NO, E.EMO_NAME, E.EMO_PRICE, E.EMO_DESC, E.EMO_FIRSTIMG, E.EMO_INNERIMG, E.EMO_PATH, C.SUB_CODE_NAME AS EMOTICON_STATE FROM EMOTICON E JOIN SUB_CODE_TBL C ON E.EMO_STATE = C.SUB_CODE

WITH DATA AS ( SELECT TAG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TAG) AS ID FROM QUESTION_BOARD ), SPLIT_DATA AS ( SELECT ID, REGEXP_SUBSTR(TAG, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) AS SPLIT_VALUE, LEVEL AS LVL FROM DATA CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(TAG, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) IS NOT NULL AND PRIOR ID = ID AND PRIOR SYS_GUID() IS NOT NULL AND LEVEL <= REGEXP_COUNT(TAG, '[^,]+') ) SELECT DISTINCT SPLIT_VALUE as tag, COUNT(SPLIT_VALUE) as cnt FROM SPLIT_DATA GROUP BY SPLIT_VALUE ORDER BY SPLIT_VALUE
SELECT EMO_NAME, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM MY_EMOTICON GROUP BY EMO_NAME
